text: [Music]
middlebury is one of the oldest
e-commerce platforms in south africa
we've been around for more than 20 years
our current hardware that we were
running our site on was getting pretty
old we had outages we had physical
hardware failures and it was just a
general challenge in keeping us
up and running we know we don't the last
thing we want to do is go down because
it costs us money we've migrated to the
amazon
aurora database the primary reason that
we went with aws was because of the fact
that they had a local data center they
were very willing very able to help us
onboard the whole platform they were
able to get us the right advice and to
make sure that the migration was a
success so that it allows us to to focus
on what are called businesses and that's
selling products so it was consuming a
good 30 40 of the time just managing
hardware and patching whereas now with
using a platform as a service like the
aurora database it means that we just
need to worry about the data itself and
the performance of that database going
forward our kind of future plans and
with the capabilities that aws provides
we can then start looking at things like
moving on to more
micro services based architecture
and we can start using some of the more
advanced capabilities that they provide
